column5: Glad to hear you are back.  Hope tomorrow and the next see you stronger.  At least you have a fighting spirit (nicer to say than stubborn)  hehe
Glad to hear you are back on the road to recovery Rick, just keep following that road and you'll be fine! Nice to see you posting again.
Good deal bud If you get sick of the snow you can come South for a visit.....   Art
welcome back Rick I will remember the tips for staying away I have dad all set up HD, net were all good
glad you are feeling well enough to be home!  Take care!  Cheers

Been recouping at a relatives house. No internet! man that was tough. But I am recovering (disobeyed doctors orders to not do any shovelling and paid the price in a big way). So listen to your doctor and make sure your relatives have internet and cable before you stay with them...thats what I learned this month Good to be home guys!
Hey bud glad to hear. Now sit back an relax and read up. You missed much.LOL
Welcome home Rick!   Sounds like you have learned a good lesson.....now remember it!
Good to see you back Rick, hope you're feeling better now....as for your lesson, it's one I've yet to learn   More power to you  Maureen
Always good to be home! Glad to hear your doin ok.  Gettin snow up here if your  lookin for exercise  TB
Welcome back bud
Hope your feeling better Rick!
Welcome back man.  Curt
Great news Rick Welcome back
Good to see you are back.Glad you have family around to help out.There is family here too ,give a yell if you need help. Joe
Welcome home Rick, it's good having you back.

Great to hear you are back home, Richard, the whole place went to hell right after you disappeared, the remaining mods were lost.  Total confusion and disarray.  I am betting that they will refuse to even acknowledge that traumatic DoS attack foisted on us by he who must not be named.  It was pretty turvy, not to mention topsy as well, also.  As you can see, they almost got things back on an even keel, but still, I feel a lot better knowing teh webmaster is back.
Glad to see you back! Leave it alone, it will eventually melt.
Welcome back Rick, always best to be home. Ya still have to take it easy tho'.
Welcome Back Rick, kind of Missed ya.
Hey Rick . Glad to see you here again.
Welcome back Rick, and fer gawd sakes.......TAKE 'ER EASY!!!!!  Sinker
Good to hear you are back and in fine form Rick.  There is nothing worse than withdrawals from the INTERNET.  I do hope you are feeling much better.
welcome back
Welcome home! Don't mess around, Doctors tell you not to do things for a reason, pay attention next time, you don't need to spend any more time in hospitals.
Hospitals are horrible places, full of sick people.
Glad to see your back and hope you getting better soon. Will see you on the water sooner or later
Time to do what you've been told,  RELAX.  Sink into it.  CHILL  Take YOUR time.   Now, take some moooore.   Let your body settle, heal and rejuvenate.   Invest your strength for tomorrow.
Glad to see you back Rick....
Welcome Back! I learned my lesson (very similar to yours) a loooong time back!  hehe...
